          <title>
            <string language="fr">Pli de roche</string>
            <string language="en">Rock folding</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsenfalte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dobradura da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piegatura della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δίπλωμα βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plegamiento de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre le pli des roches où la plupart des couches se sont usées.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the folding of rocks where the top most layers have been worn away.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pli</string>
            <string language="en">folding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches</string>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">usure</string>
            <string language="en">wear</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Falte der Felsen, in 
denen die Oberseite die meisten Schichten weg getragen worden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a dobradura das rochas 
onde o alto a maioria de camadas foi desgastado afastado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la piegatura delle 
roccie in cui la parte superiore la maggior parte dei strati è stata 
portata via.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το δίπλωμα των βράχων 
όπου η κορυφή που τα περισσότερα στρώματα έχουν φορεθεί μακριά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el plegamiento de las 
rocas donde la tapa la mayoría de las capas se ha desgastado lejos.</string>
          </description>
